titles.title: Small Business Development Centers Relief Act of 2010
To waive temporarily the matching amount requirement with respect to section 21 of the Small Business Act, and for other purposes.
Small Business Development Centers Relief Act of 2010

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Small Business.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Rural Development, Entrepreneurship and Trade.

committee.name: House Small Business
committee.subcommittee: Rural Development, Energy, and Supply Chains

bill.summary: Small Business Development Centers Relief Act of 2010 - Directs the Administrator of the Small Business Administration (SBA), during the one-year period beginning on the date of enactment of this Act, to waive the requirement that a matching amount be provided as a condition of grants authorized under the SBA's small business development center program.
